Description: Very rare Fender Stratocaster JR. Made in Mexico. 2004 This is not a Squier Mini Strat. It is much better quality. These were made for only a couple of years, in the early 2000's. It is in great shape. There is a finish crack in neck pocket. A finish chip on the end of lower horn, and some cracks on the edge. Some wear on the frets, and some small dents on back of neck. Minor dust, dirty, handprints from normal useage. This is the first Fender JR, I have ever seen. I thought it was a fake until I did some research. I am showing a product description I got from MF/GC website when this was a new product in early 2000's. ONLINE SPECS........In response to popular demand Fender has created a smaller version of the Standard Stratocaster, perfect for players with smaller hands, for travel, or just kickin' back on the couch and riffin'. The Junior Strat has an alder body, 22-3/4"-scale C-shape neck, 3 single-coil pickups, rswd fretboard, and a hardtail bridge. 5-way switching with volume and tone controls. FEATURES Alder body Modern C-shape maple neck 22-3/4" scale length Rswd fingerboard Fender hardtail bridge 3 Fender single-coil pickups 5-way switching Volume and tone controls Shipping quote is for USA 48 State Ground address, not PO BOXES.
